message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I really appreciate you coming down from your initial price. I'm interested, but I can only go up to $85 right now.  What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $100. It's a great price, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $100 is still a bit out of my range. I'm happy to meet you in the middle again at $90. It's the best I can do right now.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $95. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great price for the product.
